price: 113 Toutefois, ils ne sont pas tous semblables. Il est, parmi les gens du Livre, des hommes droits qui, aux heures de la nuit, récitent en prière les versets d’Allah.
arabic: ۞ لَيۡسُواْ سَوَآءٗۗ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُمَّةٞ قَآئِمَةٞ يَتۡلُونَ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَهُمۡ يَسۡجُدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: laysū sawāan min ahli al-kitābi ummatun qāimatun yatlūna āyāti al-lahi ānāa al-layli wahum yasjudūna
